question: You enjoy vibrant social events with lots of people.
You often spend time exploring unrealistic yet intriguing ideas.
Your travel plans are more likely to look like a rough list of ideas than a detailed itinerary.
You are more inclined to follow your head than your heart.
You often prefer to be alone to recharge rather than socializing.
You find it easy to stay relaxed and focused even when under pressure.
You rely more on imagination than past experience when solving problems.
Your work style is closer to spontaneous bursts of energy than organized consistency.
You rarely worry about how your actions affect other people.
You tend to avoid being the center of attention.
